sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnnotetrnsmit ( note_id , note_trnsmit_id , trnsmiter_id , delete_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #noteId# , #noteTrnsmitId# , #trnsmiterId# , #deleteAt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnnotetrnsmit SET note_id = #noteId# , note_trnsmit_id = #noteTrnsmitId# , trnsmiter_id = #trnsmiterId# , delete_at = #deleteAt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND note_id = #noteId# AND note_trnsmit_id = #noteTrnsmitId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE 1 = 1 AND note_id = #noteId# AND note_trnsmit_id = #noteTrnsmitId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT note_id , note_trnsmit_id , trnsmiter_id , delete_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE note_id = #noteId# AND note_trnsmit_id = #noteTrnsmitId#

SELECT note_id , note_trnsmit_id , trnsmiter_id , delete_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE 1=1
note_id = #searchKeyword#
note_trnsmit_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY note_id DESC , note_trnsmit_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnnotetrnsmit WHERE 1=1
note_id = #searchKeyword#
note_trnsmit_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
